[+] Dataset: a data frame for illustrations

expr2latex_()

[!.] Translate `plotmath` expressions to LaTeX and remove leading and tailing quotes

facet_wl()

[!] Control facetting parameters in `ggplot` of `hyperSpec` object

ggLims() get_ggLims() set_ggLims()

[!] Convenience functions to get and set the axis limits in ggplot2 object

ggplot(<hyperSpec>)

[!] ggplot method for class hyperSpec

gg_barplot()

A barplot with counts above bars.

gg_palette() palette2vec()

[!.] Add color palette to `ggplot`

highlight_ranges()

Highlight wavelength ranges in a ggplot2 plot of hyperSpec object

label_expr2text()

[!] Convert 'plotmath' expresions in labels to text

nTick_x() nTick_y()

[+] Control number of ticks in ggplot2 plots with continuous scale

palette_PAP

[+] Color palette

plotly_annotation_rm() plotly_annotation_list() plotly_annotation_n() plotly_annotation_text()

[!] Manage annotations in a plotly object

plotly_modify_hover()

[!] Modify hover in a plotly object

plotly_modify_legend()

[!] Modify legend of a plotly object

plotly_tidy() plotly_tidy0() ggplotly_tidy() ggplotly_tidy0()

Tidy up `plotly` plot

spPlot

Various ploting functions for `hyperSpec`, `ggplot2`, `plotly`, etc

subplot_1() subplot_2()

Wrapper functions for plotly::subplot
